CHAT.comment: MYRNA GOMEZ-PEREZ, Petitioner v. JOHN E. POTTER, POSTMASTER GENERAL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:04 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JOSEPH R. GUERRA ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF GREGORY G. GARRE ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF JOSEPH R. GUERRA ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:03 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
